title: Ghetto Justice II
resume: Ghetto Justice II is an Hong Kong modern drama series produced by TVB. It is a sequel to the 2011 hit series Ghetto Justice. This sequel features original cast members Kevin Cheng, Myolie Wu, Sam Lee and Alex Lam with the addition of new cast members Christine Kuo, JJ Jia, Raymond Cho and Elena Kong. Joyce Tang and Eddie Kwan didn't reprise their roles in the sequel and was excused off in the series.
